Class BoardGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node

javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.gamescreen.BoardGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class BoardGUI extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Represents the graphical user interface of the game board.

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardGUI

      public BoardGUI(Board board, GameSystem gameSystem)
      Constructs a new BoardGUI object.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board to visualize.
      gameSystem - The game system to call when a human make a move.

  • Method Details

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(boolean withHints)

      Updates the graphical user interface of the game board to reflect the current state.

      • Sets the images of the cells based on the state of the board.
      • Plays a sound effect if a disk is flipped or placed.
      • Marks the last played cell.
      Parameters:
      withHints - A boolean value indicating whether to display hints for human player or not.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • getInput

      public int getInput()
      Gets the index of the last cell where the human player clicked.
      Returns:
      The index of the clicked cell.
